ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle guava nectar
des: "A light citrus punch with a tropical twist.  It's very nice for weddings and receptions in the warm months, as well as for tropical-themed parties and cookouts."
ins: Scoop sherbet into a large punch bowl. Add orange juice and guava nectar. Allow sherbet to soften for about 15 minutes, then stir to blend. Stir in lemon-lime soda just before serving.
